org.neo4j.cypherdsl.core.RelationshipPattern

Packages that use RelationshipPattern
Package
Description
org.neo4j.cypherdsl.core
Contains an internal DSL for creating Cypher.

  • Uses of RelationshipPattern in org.neo4j.cypherdsl.core

    Classes in org.neo4j.cypherdsl.core with type parameters of type RelationshipPattern
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    interface 
    ExposesPatternLengthAccessors<T extends RelationshipPattern>
    This interface is used to derive new relationship patterns from existing relationships or chains of relationships with new lengths (min, max or unbounded) configured.
    interface 
    ExposesRelationships<T extends RelationshipPattern & ExposesPatternLengthAccessors<?>>
    A marker interface for things that expose methods to create new relationships to other elements.
